Disclaimer

Accountability for content
The contents of our pages have been created with the utmost care. However, we cannot guarantee the contents accuracy, completeness or topicality. According to statutory provisions, we are furthermore responsible for our own content on these web pages. In this matter, please note that we are not obliged to monitor the transmitted or saved information of third parties, or investigate circumstances pointing to illegal activity. Our obligations to remove or block the use of information under generally applicable laws remain unaffected by this as per §§ 8 to 10 of the Telemedia Act (TMG).

Accountability for links
Responsibility for the content of external links (to web pages of third parties) lies solely with the operators of the linked pages. No violations were evident to us at the time of linking. Should any legal infringement become known to us, we will remove the respective link immediately.

Copyright
Our web pages and their contents are subject to German copyright law. Unless expressly permitted by law, every form of utilizing, reproducing or processing works subject to copyright protection on our web pages requires the prior consent of the respective owner of the rights. Individual reproductions of a work are only allowed for private use. The materials from these pages are copyrighted and any unauthorized use may violate copyright laws.

Quelle: Übersetzungsdienst translate-24h.de

Are you sure? You may not use this service to its full extent without permission to locate the site! GPS not activated Please activate your GPS in the settings to be able to use the service! To use the service, you need to allow us to retrieve your GPS coordinates. Please activate your GPS in the settings to be able to use the service! Allow GPS Enable GPS GET PETROL STATION Sorry, there seems to be a problem with the internet. This prevents us from accessing the service.\n\nJust try again in a few minutes. Get price for: %1$s - sorting: %2$s Spritsorte Suchradius in km (max 25km) TextView Sortierung Odometer Odometer* Date Date Time Time Local local Fuel type Fuel Total Cost $ $/L* Refueled litres liter* Service Notice for Service Stay calm and clear the road with minor damage Secure the scene of the accident: Switch on hazard warning system and set up hazard triangle (100m from accident site) Providing first aid if necessary Call emergency services or police Emergency : 110\nFire brigade: 112 DO NOT leave the scene of the accident before the rescue team arrives Note accident witnesses by name (contact details) Photographing the accident scene Next Check your Odometer Hint: odometer: %s You have to enter the KM driven since the last refueling here Odometer must be greater than 0 Check Currently the list is empty, just add a new entry! Distance Price Unfortunately the map could not be opened Odometer Bar Chart Pie Chart - No data available yet Delete Delete item? Are you sure you want to delete this item? Overview of\ntotal costs Unfortunately, no gas station was found in the area No breathing?\nHeart Pressure Massage and Ventilation The affected person cannot be awakened and no longer breathes. It is possible that the skin has already become very pale or blue-grey. Now is the time to hurry!\n\nA heart pressure massage as well as respiration must take place. The Johanniter experts speak of \"heart-lung resuscitation\". Press thirty times on the middle of the chest, always alternating with two ventilations - mouth-to-mouth. Visible injuries?\nWounds dress Important for wounds: Wear gloves to protect yourself. Then apply a bandage of aseptic, suitable material.\n\nIn the case of heavily bleeding wounds, the injured arm or leg is held up and the supplying artery is squeezed if possible. Then apply a pressure bandage.\n\nThe affected person has pale, cold skin, dizziness, nausea and a slow or very fast pulse? He may be in shock. If there are no problems in the chest and no other serious injuries, the affected person should be lying flat and the legs slightly raised.\n\nForeign objects in wounds should - if possible - be removed carefully with tweezers. If the foreign object is larger and stuck, the dressing can be placed over it with padding that reduces the pressure on the foreign object. Not awakened?\nStable lateral position There is an injured man in front of you. He is breathing, but cannot be awakened, unconscious.\n\nThe patient must be brought into the stable lateral position. To do this, you kneel next to the patient as an assistant. First take care of the side of the injured person close to you. Angle the arm upwards. \n\nThen the far side is next. Here the arm is placed completely over the chest and the far leg is bent.\n\nNow you put on the knee of the bent leg and pull the affected person towards you. The affected person then rolls to you on the side. Now all you have to do is overstretch your head, open your mouth and place your hands close to the affected person\'s body. You are saving lives! +Add Car Owner Add Car Owner Add Driver +Add Driver Description of the acident Damage to the other partys vehicle Damage to your own vehicle Other Party Crash Details Crash Photos Add driver Add Owner No crash has been created yet and by aborting this task, no crash will be added.
